name: Switch 'N' Shoot (itch)
description:
An endless arcade shoot 'em up with a special twist...

You can only use ONE BUTTON to switch direction and shoot at the same time!

This simple rule forces you to think on your feet and time your shots carefully. One misplaced shot and you're space-toast.

Switch 'N' Shoot is small and simple... fast and challenging... and annoyingly addictive. Your run can be over in mere seconds, but you can instantly jump straight back in for another go. Work your way up the leaderboards, learn to Hyperdrive, and take the fight to the invading Incubators!

How many alien badbutts can you take out before you become stardust?

  • Save the world with just one button.
  • Fail instantly. Retry even instantly-er.
  • Upgrade your lasers and hyperdrive into oblivion.
  • 8-bit pixel art & beautiful border illustration by Paul Duffield.
  • Crunchy sounds and music.
  • Palette swap to please your eyeballs.
  • Silly random name generator.
  • Local leaderboard (online leaderboards, achievements and stats available in Steam and Google Play versions).
This itch.io pack includes:
  • Standalone DRM-free versions for Windows, Mac and Linux.
  • Ad-free Android version.
  • Includes a free Steam key.
  • Press any button to SHOOT.
  • Press any button to SWITCH direction.
  • (yes, they are both tied to the same any button...)
